fulltext:
Doan Van Thiet
Senior Magento Developer / ERP / E-Commerce / BI / Data Engineer (Big Data)
 thietdv@gmail.com
  093 668 3706
  03 468 747 86
Niteco
Jul 2019 - Now
Magento 2 Techlead
1. Joebrowns.co.uk (Magento 2)
- Optimized performance of the website to support 3,000 concurrent users
- Developed defer Javascript extension to move JS from header to footer
- Developed extension to reindex product configurable swatch data to
reduce database load + reduce processing logic
- Developed extension to lazy load CMS block on mouse-scrolling
- Modified layered navigation extension to support ElasticSearch
- Modified search extension to support multiple-store pricing with
ElasticSearch
- Optimized server using Redis / ElasticSearch / CDN ...
2. Banner (Magento 2)
- Customized shared catalog feature of Magento 2 to allow add products
from multiple shared catalogs
- Customized checkout process to display billing address the same as
shipping address
- Developed delivery notes extension to allow adding comments to quotes &
orders
KidsPlaza.vn
Mar 2017 - Jul 2018
IT Manager
1. E-Commerce website (Magento 1)
+ Designed infrastructure for scalable / high performance system using
CQRS / event sourcing design pattern
- Used Kafka as a message queue system to listen for price / stock change
from ERP system
- Stock / price are read from message queue system then updated to
caching system ( Redis / Elastic Search ) in real-time
- Price / stock are displayed on the website in real-time after fetching from
the caching system
+ Performance tuning:
- Developed Magento Full Page Cache extension to reduce website loading
time 10x ( on high traffic website ) using ElasticSearch
- Installed / configured ElasticSearch
- Developed Magento search extension using ElasticSearch
- Developed Magento block lazy loading extension using ElasticSearch to
reduce rendered HTML from server
- Configured website caching using Redis
- Server optimization ( Apache / MySql configuration / PHP Opcache )
- CDN configuration
- JS / CSS compress / combine
WORK EXPERIENCE
- Image lazy loading
+ UX / UI optimization ( increase conversion rate by 100% ):
- Optimized design of website on desktop / mobile
- Developed / customized Magento theme
- Product recommendation / website personalisation using ML
+ ERP integration
- Developed ERP integration extension to synchronize products / stock /
price from ERP system ( Microsoft Dynamics Navision ) to Magento website
using SQL Server replication / ElasticSearch in real-time
- Omni channel
- Website security
- Digital marketing campaign monitoring and analysis
2. ERP (Dynamics Nav 2016 & Odoo)
- ERP Infrastructure
- Building plan & go live ERP system within 1 month
- Performance tuning for ERP system
- Integration with CRM / website / PowerBI
- Data warehouse
- Created BI Report (using Tableau / PowerBI / Qlik )
- Inventory Forecast using AI
3. CRM (SugerCRM / SuiteCRM / GetFly / HubSpot)
- CRM for retail supply chains ( automation )
- Integration CRM & ERP
4. Server / hardware
- Building ERP system / server infrastructure using VMWare ESXi
- Setup HA / AlwaysOn / replication for ERP database
Balance Internet
Jul 2016 - Mar 2017
Techlead / team leader
- Communicate with PMs in Australia
- Team management ( prepare tasks / review work )
- Support & train team members
- Magento theme / extension development
- UX/UI optimization
- Performance tuning with full page cache / Redis / MongoDB
- Smart search using ElasticSearch
- Code reviewing for team members
Tools used:
- Docker
- GIT
- Ubuntu
- BitBucket
Top3Media (top3.com.sg)
Jun 2011 - Dec 2015
Freelancer / supporter
A Singaporian client
- Manage a team of 3
- Develop websites based on Magento
- Develop extensions & themes
- Provide technical solutions
- Communicate directly to sale & design team
decorglamour.com
Jan 2015 - Jun 2015
Freelancer
A multi-store website ("decorglamour.com" & "decorglobe.com") with 250k
SKUs
- Performance tuning: 1s loading time for website with full page cache, CDN,
compress & combine JS & CSS
- Quick import feature for 250k SKUs ( with configurable items )
- UX/UI optimization
- Communicate directly to client for requirements.
SmartOSC
Jun 2008 - Jun 2011
Technical Manager
- Manage a small team of 4 - 5
- Train new members
- Communicate directly to clients for requirements
- Provide technical solutions
- Work on many projects
VietSoftware Jsc
Nov 2005 - Jun 2007
PHP Developer
- Work on PHP projects based on osCommerce
- Develop custom eCommerce platform based on osCommerce
- Train new members
- Communicate directly to clients for requirements
- Provide technical solutions
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Frameworks:
- Magento 2 / Magento (certified developer) / Zend Framework / CakePHP / CodeIgniter / Laravel / Wordpress
Javascript Frameworks:
- Jquery / Prototype / ReactJS / VueJS
Os:
- Windows Server / CentOS / Ubuntu
Languages:
- PHP (15 years) / Python / Javascript / CSS / HTML / C / C++ / Java / C# & .NET / NodeJS
Databases:
- MySQL / MS SQL Server / PostgreSQL / MongoDB / Redis / ElasticSearch
- Database replication / database sharding
Virtualization:
- VMWare ESXi
Tools:
- GIT / BitBucket / Docker / Jenkins
Big data:
- Apache Spark / Apache Kafka / RabbitMQ / ElasticSearch / MongoDB
BI tools:
- PowerBI / Tableau / Qlik
Dale Carnegie
2018 - 2018
Major: LeaderShip
Expected: Credit
Robusta
2018 - 2018
Major: Data Center Virtualization (VMWare ESXi)
Expected: Credit
iPMAC
2018 - 2018
Major: MCSA (Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate)
Expected: Credit
Sage
2016 - 2018
Major: CMO / Branding / Strategy / Digital, Trade, Content Marketing, Sales
Expected: Credit
FTP Aptech (FPT University)
Mar 2004 - Aug 2008
Major: Software Engineer (HDSE)
Expected: Credit
ACET
May 2009 - Sep 2009
Major: Academic English at ACET (a branch of Insearch Institute - Australia)
Expected: Credit
EDUCATION
INTERESTS
I love travelling, networking, eCommerce & marketing
2018
Transfomational Leadership
( Dale Carnegie )
2015
Magento Developer Certification
( https://www.magentocommerce.com/certification/directory/dev/8307/ )
2009
IELTS Certification (English communication skill)
2008
HDSE (Higher Diloma in Software Engineering) Certification
CERTIFICATIONS
Teamwork
Logical thinking
Creative idea
English
Communication Skill
